title: No, Dr. Denis Mukwege Didn’t Say Coronavirus Cases Are Being Falsified
subtitle: Mukwege, a renowned gynecologist, did resign from his position with the task force responding to COVID-19 in the Congo, but not for the reason stated in a meme.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: Dr. Denis Mukwege said he resigned from the coronavirus task force in the Democratic Republic of the Congo because he was being offered money to falsify COVID-19 cases.
